data.name: ISLAND_NAME_HERE
data.detailed_description:
Play as the developer of a tropical island game in this unique puzzle adventure! üèù Edit various object properties to achieve your goals and unlock more of the story. Experiment, undo, and repeat; no action is irreversible. Flex your creative skills to make an experience that is entirely your own!

Key Features

  • A relaxed environment with no time limits or irreversible consequences
  • Puzzles that allude to some of the problems that game developers solve on a daily basis
  • A meta storyline
  • Laws of nature... and some defiance of those laws
  • Art, music, programming, and design made by a solo developer
  • Additional art, music, programming, and design made by... YOU!

[SOLVE PUZZLES]


[MEET QUIRKY CHARACTERS]


[MAKE FRIENDS]


[LEAVE YOUR MARK]


[GO... UM... FISHING?]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
